my name is zach dodson. i am a penn state university student with intent to graduate in december 2024 bachelor of science degree enterprise technology integration. have experience

i ​have ​long ​held ​the ​belief ​that ​knowledge experience best gained by doing, not just listening such as lecture. majority skills listed this portfolio has been through practical means building projects helping learn.
